Organization Name: NICA (NORTHSIDE INTER-COMMUNITY AGENCY) | FORT WORTH SITE | TUES - SAT BASIC NEEDS
Keywords: Employment Resources, Job Search, Job Placement
Description: Provides emergency assistance including food and clothing. Provides advocacy, information and referral, case management (limited caseload) and crisis counseling. In addition, there are limited funds for utility bills. Must meet 150% federal poverty. Other services include; Employment information, job referrals, and training resources. Free computer classes Education and Life Skills Classes-subjects include ESL, literacy, computer training, nutrition, and health-related classes. Northside Neighborhood Association - meets every third Tuesday of the month at 6:30 pm (except in December) Community meeting space available

Organization Name: NAVAL AIR STATION JOINT RESERVE BASE - FORT WORTH | FLEET AND FAMILY SUPPORT CENTER | MILITARY FAMILY SUPPORT SERVICES
Keywords: Employment Resources, Job Search, Job Placement
Description: Provides transition assistance, financial readiness and money management, job search assistance, parenting skills and life skills classes, food pantry, and family and individual counseling. The Fleet and Family Support Center also serves as a contact point for military families with special needs such as chronic illnesses and/or disabilities through the Exceptional Family Member Program.

Organization Name: SER JOBS FOR PROGRESS NATIONAL - FORT WORTH | MAIN OFFICE | SENIOR EMPLOYMENT PROGRAM
Keywords: Employment Resources, Job Search, Job Placement
Description: Provides paid temporary job training for people age 55 and older who meet income guidelines and assists clients with updating and developing new skills. Enrollees must be willing and be able to work to qualify for this program.

Keywords: Employment Resources, Job Search, Job Placement
Description: Provides employment and career comprehensive services, such as computer access for resume preparation, job searches, phone, copier, and fax machine access.
